author: Betsy Woodruff Swan and Daniel Lippman
title: Union: DHS cutting workers' leave over border security concerns
description: The policy change would put workers at risk, the National Treasury Employees Union national president wrote in a letter.
content: After the novel coronavirus outbreak began, the number of people traveling into the U.S. and passing through CBP checkpoints plummeted. So the agency started letting workers take weather and safety leavemeaning, paid time offwhich reduced their risk of catchi… [+2015 chars]
